articles.title: Happiness
articles.content: This chapter of my day, is called happiness. Nothing beats the feeling of solving a bug that has been eating you up. Oh! The adrenaline Rush!!!

articles.title: Rest time
articles.content: Just finished with all the basic functionalities of my web application and now I can cook and rest. A sigh of relief.
